page.title: WCC Book Club
page.description: What sets our book club apart are the lively conversations, valuable insights and an opportunity to connect with like-minded individuals. The books we read are selected by the community, offering a diverse selection of tech books and essential soft skills topics.The book club meets monthly to share views, exchange ideas, and inspire personal and professional growth.

contact.title: Join us in our Study Group Slack channel

details.title: How It Works
details.description: Every month we vote for a book to read, and at the end of the month we review the book together in our bookclub. In order to participate join us n slack.

details.title: Benefits of Joining
details.description: Dedication, networking and always knowing what is happening in tech market.

card.title: The Pragmatic Programmer From Journeyman to Master
card.subtitle: Andrew Hunt & David Thomas
card.description: Essential guide for creating working and maintainable code amidst the complexities of modern software development.
